short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Distracting Websites to Boost Your Productivity & Stay Focus (Free)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make productivity your top priority with BlockSite and take advantage of our key features, including Custom Blocklist, Scheduled Site Blocking, and Password Protection.

⭐️Features

Effortlessly block websites with our easy-to-use platform. Simply add websites to your block list and let us handle the rest. Plus, we'll even add some humorous images to keep you motivated when you attempt to visit the blocked sites

⏰Stay Focused Extension

Eliminate all distractions and increase your focus by blocking distracting and harmful websites. With our Stay Focused Extension, you can even set a focus timer to ensure you stay on track throughout the day, whether you're at work or school.
